Author: xMcacutt
Description: Find a path from the initial fan speed to the final speed without hitting any invalid speeds. Tags: Spin, Color, Buttons, Fan, Blades, Symbols
Name: The Colored Fan

Souvenir.Explanation:
What was the initial state of the fan? 
What color was the symbol indicating the initial speed on the display screen?
What color was the symbol indicating the final speed on the display screen?
What color was not the color of a symbol on the display screen?
